title: Real Muslimah NJ
description: Khadijah's Life in Motion is a skillfully crafted work of Islamic Urban Fiction, that gives readers a realistic look into the lives of people who choose to be Muslim in Urban America. Changes in relationships amongst family and friends are highlighted in this story. Experience the rollercoaster ride that touches every emotion, as it plunges into an intriguing storyline of love, betrayel, faith, deception, loyalty, redemption, passion and hope. This book is thoroughly enjoyed by everyone-not just those of the Islamic Faith.
author: Jatasha Sharif
